comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of May 9, 1915 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10F12FC345A1273... "With the battleship Louisiana, flagship of Rear Admiral Walter McLean, commanding the Fourth Division of the United States Atlantic Fleet, leading the way, fifteen of the sixteen first and second line armorclads that are to figure in the two Presidential reviews of next week arrived in the Hudson shortly before 10 o'clock yesterday morning. " NYT of 8/11/15 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F30B13FC3A5C1373... reported that McLean (in Louisiana) would head a naval force heading to Vera Cruz.
